definition: one of the parts of a glove that provides covering for a finger or thumb, indicate the fingering for the playing of musical scores for keyboard instruments
details:
noun
- one of the parts of a glove that provides covering for a finger or thumb
- any of the terminal members of the hand, sometimes excepting the thumb
= example: any of the terminal members of the hand, sometimes excepting the thumb
- the length of breadth of a finger used as a linear measure
= synonyms: digit, fingerbreadth, finger's breadth
verb
- indicate the fingering for the playing of musical scores for keyboard instruments
- examine by touch
= synonyms: feel
- feel or handle with the fingers
= example: feel or handle with the fingers
= synonyms: thumb
- search for on the computer
= example: search for on the computer
